<span data-ttu-id="8695c-103">Pentru a vedea anteturi şi alte detalii într-un e-mail, selectaţi trei puncte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8695c-103">To see the headers and other details in an email, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="8695c-104">la colţul de sus din panoul de citire şi selectaţi **Vezi mesaj sursă**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8695c-104">at the top corner of the reading pane and select **View message source**.</span></span>
